channel.title: CVE Feed for BestWebSoft -- Contact Form Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for BestWebSoft -- Contact Form Plugin

item.title: CVE-2017-20055|2024-08-05T21:45:25.194Z -- bestwebsoft -- contact%20form%20plugin
item.description: A vulnerability classified as problematic has been found in BestWebSoft Contact Form Plugin 4.0.0. This affects an unknown part. The manipulation leads to basic cross site scripting (Stored). It is possible to initiate the attack remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. Upgrading to version 4.0.2 is able to address this issue. It is recommended to upgrade the affected component.
